title: Faux Bamboo Brush Survivor TV Tribes Galang & Tadhana
content:
I spotted this faux bamboo brush lettering on the Survivor TV show for the tribe names Galang & Tadhana.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SurvivorTribesGalangTadhana_4756.jpg)
  
I was only able to find very small images. This is as clear as I can make the letters. I had more success with Galan than Tadhana, which has a dark background, which accounts for differences in the letters.  
Does anyone have any information on whether Survivor used an existing font?  
If there is not a known font, I would be interested to see any additional letters.  
Thanks.  
Don

Font: 

 Total Glyphic 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131540/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: donshottype

comments.content: That's pretty close to [Totally Glyphic EM](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131540/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/totally-gothic). The only difference I can see is /G "bar".

Many thanks Ryuk.  
Close enough for me.  
Don
